location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 208: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Tehran. The letters (nos. 169, 190 and 191) are not included here, but nos. 169 and 191 do appear earlier in the file (see ff.63-64 and ff.65-67 respectively).
